basic.floral_language:
Cotyledon orbiculata var. oophylla 
Floriography: beautiful, glorious, lovely
Has slender white green leaves, long oval or elliptical, surface covered with white powder. With adequate light, plant is more compact and leaf edges turn red.
Likes sunny places, half shade tolerant, dormant under high temperatures in summer, put under scattered light. Flowers sometimes with orange flowers.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, orange red flowers
basic.color: Leaf color white green, when sunny leaf edges turning to red

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, resistant to half shade, short period of dormancy in summer, use half shade for better care
maintenance.watering: Keep soil moist, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
